data.name: ReadCsePerson1
data.value: select top(1) NUMB, TYPE, FAMILY_VIOL_IND from CKT_CSE_PERSON where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadCsePerson2
data.value: select distinct T1.NUMB, T1.TYPE, T1.FAMILY_VIOL_IND from CKT_CSE_PERSON T1 join CKT_CASE_ROLE T2 on (T1.NUMB = T2.CSP_NUMBER) and (T2.CAS_NUMBER = @casNumber)
